column5: Iam trying to gather some links on C&R. Not the actual C&R aspect but the conservation side.  Example:  Articles on keeping big fish in a lake.....the genetics of breeding more big fish. (the above is the major one Id like some info on)  Survival rates.  This sort of stuff.....Im trying to educate some folks here that are extremely ignorant.   Thanks

If you want i can look into it, but it's going to take about 2 weeks before i get some free time.....i'm up to my eye brows in end of the semister "work".  Send me a PM if you're interested so i don't forget.  -R-
Try doing a Google search Kyle.

There was a member here I havent seen in a few years now from Pennsyvania. His board name was Phil. Phil new almost all of the movement and life spans of larger musky from studies in the Kawarthas.A Try googling: Casselman/muskies as well Its a start for you anyway.

heres a bunch of info for ya, the C&R debate never ends good luck.  http://www.acuteangling.com/Reference/C&RMortality.html ---------mortality rate  http://members.shaw.ca/amuir/catch_and_release.htm ----- catch and release  http://www.bcadventure.com/adventure/angli...chrelease.phtml ----- catch and release
TroutGuy thanks for the info...  Ken
I have dozens of peer reviewed papers on PDF fire me an email via M and I ll send a pile over
Thank you guys tons!  I tried to google, nothing really comes up because its so specific.
Its more of a religion than a science.
